name: Neant
text: The angel now seems to be denying you his way.

name: Neant
text: Seeing him awakens your memories : those of Earch's helping hand.

name: Neant
text: Her gentle voice and innate compassion.

name: Neant
text: Her relevant help and what might have become of it.

name: Neant
text: You only understand it now, but you are sorry you stopped listening to her.
